snippet.title: Silpheed (Sega CD) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A complete playthrough of Sega's 1993 Sega CD FMV-based rail shooter Silpheed. 

This is an extremely nice upgrade over the already impossibly impressive original PC game from 1986 (it ran on an 8088!) that saw its original US release by Sierra in a partnership move with Game Arts for game localization in both countries. The prerendered CGI FMV background graphics are usually smooth and were especially well tailored to the Sega's color limitations. 

It's also quite difficult, in the best possible way :) 

______
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!

Visit for the latest updates!
